definition.english: To make it easier for someone to do something by offering one's services or resources.
definition.uzbek: Yordam berish - biror kishiga o‘z xizmatlari yoki resurslarini taklif qilib, biror narsani qilishni osonlashtirish.

example.english: She helped her brother with his homework.
example.uzbek: U o‘z ukasiga uy vazifasida yordam berdi.

definition.english: The action of helping someone; assistance.
definition.uzbek: Yordam - biror kishiga yordam berish harakati; ko‘mak.

example.english: I offered my help to the neighbors.
